files.help:
It is required to migrate data by hand.
mkdir "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/scummvm/ "$XDG_DATA_HOME"/scummvm
mv ~/.scummvmrc "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/scummvm/scummvm.ini
mv ~/.scummvm "$XDG_DATA_HOME"/scummvm/saves
_Relevant issue_: https://github.com/scummvm/scummvm/pull/656
